channel.title: Wilderness pointers
channel.description: i want to add wilderness to a certain point in a town but im not how how i would go about this i know i have to change this in the point.java but not sure how. anyone able to tell me atleast what kind of method i need to use?

item.title: Wilderness pointers
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:12, topic:384798”][quote author=yong min link=topic=480559.msg3522438#msg3522438 date=1299502334]

Basically its a few lines of code in point class, With your coords and what ever, Along with editing the “attack” method in client, If I remember correctly?

currect.
and player class.
its basictly only a “if” statement for the spawn point.

if(player.getLocation().inBlABLA() {
teleport(bla, bla);
}
on death OFC.

Yong helped me with the client side on on;
On the client you can do:

public boolean f2p() { // 146 265 179 249 är f2p area int x = sectionX + areaX; int y = sectionY + areaY; return (( x <= 179) && (x >= 146) && (y <= 265) && (y >= 249)); }

I make it for $$ the whole tingy…

If I get some free time, I will help with both the server and client side methods, as done with Mario.
[/quote]

You can make a tut, I been thinking about doing it but im to lazy ::)[/quote]

Maybe when I am free.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness pointers
item.dc:creator: @uberpk3r uberpk3r
item.description:
@uberpk3r wrote:

There wont be bugs because you basicly copy the wilderness from orginal. its very simple honestly. don’t make it more complicated from him.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness pointers
item.dc:creator: @Intoxication Intoxication
item.description:
@Intoxication wrote:

[quote=“SVU, post:4, topic:384798”][quote author=masterpowers link=topic=480559.msg3518555#msg3518555 date=1299206778]
what kind of bugs can it bring up? and i know its not alot of coding it’s jus how its done im somewhat confused when looking at points.java
[/quote]
Spawn Points, attacking in the towns\outside towns. Items dropping etc… I mean if you have the time to fix them and can make them perfect then do it.

And it can be a lot of work if you make certain areas(multiple towns\areas) wilderness and some ‘safe zones’.[/quote]

You set the boundaries and do easy math for wildnerness levels. If you have bugs from it then you’re doing it completely wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness pointers
item.dc:creator: @SVU SVU
item.description:
@SVU wrote:

masterpowers:

what kind of bugs can it bring up? and i know its not alot of coding it’s jus how its done im somewhat confused when looking at points.java

Spawn Points, attacking in the towns\outside towns. Items dropping etc… I mean if you have the time to fix them and can make them perfect then do it.

And it can be a lot of work if you make certain areas(multiple towns\areas) wilderness and some ‘safe zones’.

Read full topic
